group.title: Pockets
group.description: A pita pocket sandwich, add a side of hummus, tabouleh, and pita bread for only $2.50!

item.title: Kibbe Pocket
item.description: Pita bread filled with a grilled beef or lamb kibbe patty, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, parsley and hummus

item.title: Falafel Pocket
item.description: Pita bread filled with traditional or spicy falafel, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, parsley and tahini sauce

item.title: Shawarma Pockets
item.description: Pita bread filled with your choice of either a grilled chicken, beef or lamb patty with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, parsley and tahini sauce

item.title: Kafta Pocket
item.description: Pita bread filled with a grilled beef and lamb Kafta patty, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, parsley and hummus

item.title: Tabouleh and Hummus Pocket
item.description: Pita bread filled with a generous mix of our hummus and tabouleh

item.title: Lentil Tabouleh Pocket
item.description: Pita bread filled with a generous mix of our moujadra and tabouleh

item.title: Fattoush Salad
item.description: A crispy baked pita bowl filled with freshly cut lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, parsley, and seasoned with mint, sumac, and garlic, drizzled with fresh lemon juice and extra virgin olive oil dressing

item.title: Shawarma Salad
item.description: A crispy baked pita bowl filled with shawarma seasoned chicken, beef, or lamb, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and parsley, drizzled with tahini sauce
item.price: Regular Salad - Chicken or Beef: $6.99, Lamb: $8.48
item.price2: Side Salad - Chicken or Beef: $4.50, Lamb: $5.50

item.title: Falafel Salad
item.description: A crispy baked pita bowl filled with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and parsley: topped with falafel and drizzled with tahini

item.title: Lentil and Cabbage
item.description: A crispy baked pita bowl filled with Moujadra (mix of lentil and rice), freshly cut cabbage and tomatoes, seasoned with garlic and drizzled with fresh lemon juice and extra virgin olive oil

item.title: Bulgar Wheat
item.description: A crispy baked pita bowl filled with warm bulgur cooked in tomato sauce and topped with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and olives; drizzled with fresh lemon juice and extra virgin olive oil

item.title: Traditional Hummus
item.description: A traditional lebanese mix of chickpeas, tahini, garlic, lemon and seasonings. Available flavors: Artichoke, Roasted Red Pepper, Black Olive and Oregano, Horseradish, and Spicy!

item.title: Traditional Tabouleh
item.description: Our traditional Tabouleh made with the right mix of cracked wheat or corn, tomatoes, onions, parsley, drizzled with fresh lemon juice and extra virgin olive oil.

item.title: Traditional Baba Ghanouj
item.description: BBQ Eggplants with a delicious balanced mix of tahini paste, garlic, lemon juice and spices. Also available in a spicy variation with cayenne pepper

item.title: Stuffed Kibbe
item.description: Bulgur wheat mixed with either beef, chicken, lentils, pumpkin, or potatoes

item.title: Kibbe Combo
item.description: 6 stuffed kibbe with a side of hummus, tabouleh, and pita bread

item.title: Kibbe Pops
item.description: Bite-sized stuffed beef kibbe pops, also available in a combo meal for kids

item.title: Baked Kibbe
item.description: Sauteed beef and onions between two layers of beef kibbe baked to perfection

item.title: Falafel Platter
item.description: 8 Falafel patties, with pita bread and toppings for two regular sized-wraps or pockets, also available in a spicy variation with cayenne pepper

item.title: Falafel Patties
item.description: Individual falafel patties made with the right blend of chick peas and fresh herbs and seasonings, also available in a spicy variation with cayenne pepper

item.title: Spinach Pie
item.description: Spinach, onions, lemon juice, and seasonings

item.title: Meat Pie
item.description: Beef, onions, tomatoes and seasonings

item.title: Chicken Pie
item.description: Chicken, red bell peppers, onions and seasonings

item.title: Potato Pie
item.description: Potatoes, onions, parsley, mint, garlic

item.title: Cheese Pie
item.description: Mozzarella and feta cheese pie

item.title: Lentil Soup
item.description: Lightly seasoned boiled red lentils mixed with rice

item.title: Kibbe Soup
item.description: Beef kibbe boiled in tomato, garlic, and mint broth

item.title: Chicken Soup
item.description: Chicken with vegetables and rice

item.title: Moujadra
item.description: Warm lentils with sauteed onions and rice
